channel.title: No-Ip problem! HELP!
channel.description:
Okay, i run the DOC or DUC no-ip thing, the smile came and it shows like acceptable, but then i run the server it says like ''Runs (server source) on Ip 0.0.0.0 : 43594 and the 0.0.0.0 is wierd? Cause shouldn't it be my IP, and such..
My ''RunServer'' if ie dit it it says like @echo off color 0a title GeblPk java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.6.10-ga-bin.jar server pause
thats how it is, but another thing is, i haven't open my port yet, can it be that problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2008, 12:39:58 pm[/size][hr]bump..

item.title: No-Ip problem! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @dazzed dazzed
item.description:
@dazzed wrote:

Okay, i run the DOC or DUC no-ip thing, the smile came and it shows like acceptable, but then i run the server it says like ''Runs (server source) on Ip 0.0.0.0 : 43594 and the 0.0.0.0 is wierd? Cause shouldn’t it be my IP, and such…

My ‘‘RunServer’’ if ie dit it it says like
@echo off
color 0a
title GeblPk
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.6.10-ga-bin.jar server
pause

thats how it is, but another thing is, i haven’t open my port yet, can it be that problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2008, 12:39:58 pm[/size][hr]bump…

Read full topic
